question: At the onset of pubey the testicular size reaches?
exp: At the onset of pubey the testicular size reaches 4 ml volume or 2.5 cm length.

question: Order of development of secondary sexual characteristics in male-
exp: The sequence of development of secondary sexual characteristics in boys: Testicular enlargement - Penis enlargement - Pubic hair growth- Peak growth velocity -Axillary hair -Facial hair
opa: Testicular development- pubic hair- axillary hair-beard
opb: Pubic hair- testicular development- axillary hair--beard
opc: Testicular development- beard- pubic hair- axillary hair
opd: Axillary hair-beard- pubic hair- testicular development

question: In boys which is the first visible sign of pubey?
exp: In boys- first visible sign of pubey is testicular enlargement. While in girls, the first sign of pubey is thelarche or breast development.

question: During pubey the height of boys increase by:
exp: During pubey the height of boys increase by 20-30 cm Girls - 16-28 cm.

question: Menarche usually occurs how much time after thelarche?
exp: Menarche usually occurs 2-2.5 years after thelarche.

question: Growth spu in girls occurs in which stage of pubey?
exp: Growth spu in girls occurs in stage 3 of pubey Boys- occurs in stage 4.

question: Early adolescent age is:
exp: Adolescent group Early Mid Late Age 10-13 years 14-16 years 17-19 years

question: Most common cause of peripheral precocious pubey in males?
exp: Most common cause of peripheral precocious pubey in males-Congenital adrenal hyperplasia Precocious pubey- onset of pubey <8 years (girls), <9 years (boys) MC cause of central precocious pubey boys - CNS pathology (hypothalamic hemaoma) girls - idiopathic MC cause of peripheral precocious pubey boys - CAH girls - ovarian causes MC cause of delayed pubey both in boys & girls- constitutional growth delay
